amendment.description: To provide for the establishment of a National Bipartisan Commission on Medicare Reform.

vote.text: Amendment SA 948 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 948 proposed by Senator Graham SC. (consideration: CR S8512-8515; text as modified: CR S8512-8514) To provide for the establishment of a National Bipartisan Commission on Medicare Reform.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 948 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 948 proposed by Senator Graham SC.
